name: Tatascan - Habano - CoronaÂ
additionalNotes: Julio Eiroa and his son, Justo, owners of JRE Tobaccos wanted to make a great cigar at an affordable price. They succeeded when the created the Tatascan Habano. Handmade in Honduras, the Tatascan Habano is a puro in every sense of the word. The Tatascan Habano features a natural Habano wrapper, a Corojo binder, and a blended filler that is composed of Corojo and Honduran Habano tobaccos. The Tatascan Habano is a mild to medium bodied cigar that is full of flavor and offers complex notes of cedar, pepper, and caramel. Buy them by the bunch because you will definitely want to smoke them every day.
